title: [SOLVED]SMC compatibility between 820-3662 and 820-3787
message:
Hello,

Simple question... is the SMC swappable between a 820-3662 board and a 820-3787 board?

Thanks

title: [SOLVED]SMC compatibility between 820-3662 and 820-3787
message: It will be confused at the lack of/addition of GPU temperature sensors.

title: [SOLVED]SMC compatibility between 820-3662 and 820-3787
message: Nope, fan issues due to missing thermal sensor from GPU.
